Aug. 30, 1902 D Darwen Contest
Darwen Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
darwen-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Maritana [arr. Round]
Bold Venture Park, Darwen March: 1. Blackburn, 2. Goodshaw. Best euphonium - Goodshaw. Best cornet - Darwen Temperance. Best trombone and horn - Blackburn Ragged School. Best soprano - Darwen Borough. 9 bands competed.
May 12, 2014, 7:34 p.m. May 11, 2020, 3:48 p.m.
1 Darwen Borough Prize Band William Halliwell
2 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Halliwell
3 Blackburn Town Angus Holden
4 Pickup Bank Christopher Smith
